**1)** Normal Attack: Secret Spear of Wangsheng
**2)** Elemental Skill: Guide to Afterlife
**3)** Elemental Burst: Spirit Soother

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Although 4-piece Crimson Witch of Flames is Hu Tao's best set, it is only better than 4-piece Shimenawa's Reminiscence by a very small margin. As Momiji-Dyed Court contains both Shimenawa's Reminiscence and Emblem of Severed Fate (the best set for Hu Tao's dedicated Hydro supports), it is recommended that you farm that domain instead if you're just starting to build Hu Tao.
